content.rendered:
Directed by Ram Madhvani

Written by Ram Madhvani. Puneet Sharma

Star Kartik Aaryan (Arjun Pathak). Mohammed Mansoor (Side Report (as Junior)). Mrunal Thakur (Soumya Mehra Pathak (Special Appearance)). Amruta Subhash (Ankita Malaskar). Vikas Kumar (Praveen Kamath (Guest Appearance)). Vishwajeet Pradhan (Subhash Mathur). Farabi Md Refat (Refu). Aeklavya Tomer (Aasif (radio producer)). Soham Majumdar (Raghubeer Mhata / Anand Mhata)

Language Hindi

Producers Sia Bhuyan. Hasanain Hooda. Pashan Jal. Salona Bains Joshi. Sonia Kanwar. Amita Madhvani. Ram Madhvani. Rhea Prabhu. Ronnie Screwvala. Sumit Shukla. Sushmita Yadav. Sanaya Irani Zohrabi

Production Globalgate Entertainment. Lotte Entertainment. RSV
